QuestData.Title: Lockdown!
QuestData.Description: What are you still doing here, citizen? Haven't you heard? The city's under complete lockdown.$B$BGo see Lieutenant Walden -- he'll give you further directions for evacuation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Lieutenant Walden in the northwestern end of the Merchant Square.
QuestData.RewardText: Deep claw marks run through the man's corpse.
